row2k results

High School/Scholastic
NEIRA Boys & Girls Eights,Stonington vs Fairfield Prep vs Farmington
April 7, 2024 - Mystic, CT
Submitted by Sally Machin
Distance: 1500m
Conditions: Strong tailwind throughout. Head current for boys 3v. Boys 2v minimal current as tide shifted. Rest of races variable amount of tail current. Times are not comparable between races.
Comments: Novice races (4th boat) and girls 2V were 1000m races due to conditions at the start. Farmington scratched novice boys and girls 8s due to rough conditions. For the Stonington boys 4th boat, many rowers were doubled from the 3rd boat. For Girls 2V 8+, some rowers from Stonington 1V doubled. Thank you to Farmington and Fairfield Prep for making the trip to Mystic!
RESULTS
Men's Racing
First Boat:
Fairfield Prep 4:29.1
Stonington 4:29.6
Farmington 4:55.5
Second Boat:
Stonington 4:46.3
Farmington 5:07.5
Fairfield Prep 5:13.6
Third Boat:
Stonington 5:24.1
Fairfield Prep 5:26.1
Fourth Boat:
Fairfield Prep 3:27.4
Stonington (exhibition) 3:24.6

Women's Racing
First Boat:
Stonington 5:14.2
Farmington 5:24.3
Second Boat:
Farmington 3:45.9
Stonington (exhibition) 3:37.4
